com.vector.cfg.automation.api

Interface IScriptCreationApiWithFields

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDynamicObjectAware, IScriptCreationApi, IScriptTaskTypeApi

    @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public interface IScriptCreationApiWithFields
extends IScriptCreationApi, IScriptTaskTypeApi
    IScriptCreationApiWithFields collects the IScriptTaskTypeApi and the IScriptCreationApi to one common interface. This interface is active, when a script is loaded.

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vector.cfg.automation.scripting.api.IScriptCreationApi
